task.en: Use the system's built-in calculator to calculate the average score of the students, then round the average down, and fill it into the table (remember to press Enter, otherwise the numbers won't save).
task.zh: 帮我用系统自带的计算器计算表格中学生的平均分，然后把均分向下取整，填写到表格里（记得按回车，要不然数字不会保存）。
task.ar: استخدم الحاسبة المدمجة بالنظام لحساب متوسط درجات الطلاب، ثم قم بتقريب المتوسط إلى أسفل وأدخله في الجدول (تذكر الضغط على Enter وإلا لن يتم حفظ الأرقام).
task.ja: システム内蔵の計算機を使って、学生たちの平均点を計算し、その平均値を切り捨てて表に入力してください（Enterキーを押さないと数字は保存されません）。
task.ru: Используйте встроенный в систему калькулятор, чтобы вычислить средний балл студентов, затем округлите его вниз и заполните в таблице (не забудьте нажать Enter, иначе данные не сохранятся).

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "Blank"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "空白"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'

grading_command: defaults read com.apple.calculator LastResultValue 2>/dev/null | awk '{printf "%.2f\n", $1}' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "94.33" && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to get value of cell "B4"' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "94" && echo "True" || echo "False"
